In addition to embarrassing
yourself and loved ones you could find yourself facing charges of
child pornography or possession of child pornography depending on
your age PERIOD

Cell phones have revolutionized the way we communicate PERIOD We can
connect easily with people who live miles away by either the
traditional phone call or sending pictures video or text messages PERIOD
But the contents of what we send to others may be damaging whether
we know it or not PERIOD

In January  three
girls from a Pennsylvania high school allegedly sent nude or
seminude pictures of themselves to three boys PERIOD These six teenagers
were all under the legal age of  and caused quite a
scandal PERIOD

A similar case happened before PERIOD According to CBS News 

As far as the popularity of sexting goes the National Campaign
to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy stated that about 
percent of teens have sexted PERIOD

However CBS News reported on a more recent and specific
survey by Cox Communications

 A more positive statistic was that


There is always a way for
a sent picture to go from someones cell phone to the Internet PERIOD
Once it hits the Web it can be forwarded and posted everywhere by
anyone PERIOD Would you really want a racy picture of yourself floating
around endlessly on the Internet I wouldnt PERIOD

So maybe you and your
sweetheart are  or older PERIOD Maybe the child pornography charges
wont apply to you but youre still risking your career PERIOD
Throughout the years we have heard about other people in various
high professions and their habits concerning
pornography PERIOD

What happened to them Their reputations were ruined PERIOD

Though sexting may be a way to set off sparks in a relationship
it really isnt the best way PERIOD It could be easy to avoid all the
negative attention by waiting for the right time and place to be
intimate with that special someone PERIOD In fact shouldnt any actions
relating toward intimacy be in a private environment
